var metricsName = "DesktopCredibleBadgesInTopReviewsDetailPageCount" if(window.ue) { ue.count(metricsName, 0) } Sandra 4.0 out of 5 stars At-Home Spa Day Vibes! 🌿✨ Reviewed in Canada on January 31, 2025Pattern Name: Gold (6 Pairs)Verified Purchase Grace & Stella Eye Masks – At-Home Spa Day Vibes!I grabbed the 6-pack of these Grace & Stella eye masks for a little at-home spa day treat, and I was excited to see if they’d help with my dark circles. I’ve used them a few times now, and while I can’t say I’ve seen drastic improvements (yet—I'm only a few uses in!), I wanted to share my experience so far!First off, no irritation for me, and I have super sensitive skin. That’s a big win! I store them in the fridge, which adds an extra cooling kick. There’s something so satisfying about those chilled, relaxing vibes. It feels like a mini escape without leaving my couch. And hey, I’m all about that self-care life, right?As for dark circles, I’m still waiting to see if they’ll work their magic long-term, but honestly, after just a few uses, I haven’t noticed a major change. Maybe with more frequent use, I'll get more noticeable results? I can’t speak to puffiness since that’s not really an issue for me, but I’m betting the fridge trick would definitely help with that!Final thoughts: If you’re looking for a relaxing, refreshing treat for your face that doesn’t irritate sensitive skin, these are totally worth trying! Will they cure dark circles right away? Probably not. But for a chilled-out, pampering experience, I’m sold. I’m definitely keeping them in rotation for my spa day vibes! 💆‍♀️✨ Read more 21 people found this helpful Helpful Report
